import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Router} from '@angular/router' @Component({ selector: 'app-admin', templateUrl: './admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin.component.css'] }) export class AdminComponent { constructor(private router:Router){} logout(){ localStorage.removeItem("adminId"); this.router.navigateByUrl("admin/login") } }
